amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal low-income programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to exempt from the provisions of the bill those federal programs that pertain to low-income housing. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 15 in the Congressional Record of January 18, 1995.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hall (OH) amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 289 (Roll no. 74).
